title: Zoo Dance
creator_credit: Tony Paice and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Dance movement programme operates at the Royal Melbourne Zoo. Its aims include encouraging creativity and communication between students and teachers, self-expression, building self confidence. Available to children with disabilities as well as the regular school student.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Paice and Victoria. Ministry of Education
